pageContext.claim: “Less than 48 hours before start of the Impeachment Hearing Hoax, on Monday, the No Due Process, Do Nothing Democrats are, believe it or not, changing the Impeachment Guidelines because the facts are not on their side. When you can't win the game, change the rules!”
pageContext.analysis: The Democrats did not “change the rules.” Rather, they laid out how the process will work. The U.S. constitution only provides loose guide posts for how the process must proceed.
